auth.authRequired: Authenticatie is vereist om deze applicatie te gebruiken
auth.tokenExpired: Uw sessie is verlopen. Log opnieuw in.
auth.signInRequired: U moet inloggen om deze functie te gebruiken
auth.secureAuth: Veilige authenticatie mogelijk gemaakt door Google
auth.whyChooseIntro: In tegenstelling tot standaard AI-chatbots die simpelweg vragen beantwoorden, is Research Agent uw uitgebreide onderzoekspartner gebouwd voor diepgaand onderzoek en kennisopbouw.
auth.webConnectedDesc: Real-time webzoeken en content-extractie zorgen voor actuele, nauwkeurige informatie ‚Äì geen verouderde trainingsgegevens
auth.multiToolDesc: Combineert naadloos webzoeken, code-uitvoering, YouTube-transcripties, beeldgeneratie en documentanalyse in √©√©n gesprek
auth.knowledgeBaseDesc: Sla bevindingen op in uw persoonlijke kennisbank, cre√´er fragmenten en bouw uitgebreide onderzoeksdocumenten in de loop van de tijd
auth.advancedPlanningDesc: Genereer gestructureerde onderzoeksplannen met expert-persona's, zoekstrategie√´n en methodologische benaderingen
auth.costEffectiveDesc: Gebruik uw eigen API-sleutels voor $0 LLM-kosten, of maak automatisch gebruik van gratis providers
auth.transparencyDesc: Volg elke API-aanroep, token-gebruik en kosten in real-time facturatie-dashboard
auth.perfectFor: Perfect voor: Academisch onderzoek, marktanalyse, contentcreatie, technische documentatie, competitieve intelligentie en elke taak die grondig onderzoek vereist.

planning.title: Onderzoeksplanning
planning.signInToUsePlanning: Please sign in to use planning
planning.signInRequired: Please sign in with Google to use the planning feature
planning.authExpired: Authentication expired. Please sign out and sign in again to continue.
planning.authRequired: Authentication required. Please sign in with Google to continue.
planning.savePlanTooltip: Save the current plan to your saved plans list
planning.debugTooltip: Copy debug info for Copilot troubleshooting
planning.clearAllTooltip: Clear all planning data and start fresh
planning.systemPromptHelp: This defines the AI's role and behavior. Edit as needed before transferring to chat.
planning.userQueryHelp: This is the message that will be sent to the chat. Edit to refine your query.
planning.llmInfoTooltip: View LLM transparency info (model, tokens, cost)
planning.cannotSavePlan: Cannot save plan: No valid plan generated
planning.storageWarningHelp: Consider deleting old plans to free up space.
planning.simpleQueryHelp: This query can be answered directly without extensive planning.
planning.longFormNote: Note: This will be built in stages using snippets. Each section will be researched and written separately, then combined into a final document.
planning.updateQueryDetails: Update your query with more details:
planning.guidanceQuestions: üí° Please answer these questions to refine your plan:
planning.updatePromptWithAnswers: Update your research prompt with answers:
planning.guidanceTip: üí° Tip: Include answers to the questions above in your updated query. The more specific you are, the better the AI can create an effective multi-iteration plan with proper tool usage and few-shot examples.
planning.guidanceExamplePlaceholder:
Example: I want to build a comprehensive research report on climate change by:
1. Creating 25 todos for different sub-topics (policy, science, economics, etc.)
2. Searching the web for each topic and saving results to snippets
3. Generating charts to visualize key data points
4. Combining all snippets into a master analysis

Please create a detailed plan with few-shot examples showing how to use create_todo, search_web, create_snippet, and generate_chart together in each iteration...
planning.forcePlanTooltip: Let AI answer the questions and force plan generation
planning.resetTooltip: Clear guidance mode and return to previous state
planning.guidanceModeHelp: This mode detects complex projects that require multiple iterations and extensive tool usage. Answer the questions above to help create a detailed execution plan with few-shot examples showing how to use todos, snippets, and multiple tool calls per iteration.
planning.clarificationAnswer: Please use your best judgment based on the original query.

settings.title: Instellingen
settings.generalDescription: Configure general application settings including language and display preferences
settings.languageHelp: Changes the interface language and instructs the AI to respond in your selected language
settings.providerDescription: Configure your LLM provider API keys. The backend automatically selects the best model for each request
settings.modelStrategyDescription: Choose how the system selects models for your requests. This balances cost, quality, and performance
settings.cheapDescription: Prioritize free providers (Groq, Gemini) and smallest capable models. Falls back to paid providers only when rate-limited. Best for most use cases
settings.balancedDescription: Choose models that reliably do the job without compromising quality. Uses free tier when quality is equivalent, paid models when quality matters. Balances cost vs. capability
settings.powerfulDescription: Use the best available models (GPT-4o, Gemini 2.5 Pro, o1) for maximum capability. Prioritizes quality over cost. Uses reasoning models for complex analysis
settings.fastestDescription: Prioritize low-latency models (Groq) for quick responses. May sacrifice some quality for speed in simple requests. Great for interactive sessions
settings.tavilyHelp: Enables enhanced web search and scraping via Tavily API. Falls back to DuckDuckGo if not provided
settings.webSearchDescription: Search the web for current information, news, and articles
settings.executeJsDescription: Execute JavaScript code for calculations and data processing
settings.scrapeUrlDescription: Extract content from specific URLs and websites
settings.youtubeDescription: Search YouTube for videos with transcript support
settings.transcribeDescription: Convert audio and video files to text transcriptions
settings.chartDescription: Create visualizations and charts from data
settings.imageDescription: Create AI-generated images from text descriptions
settings.ragDescription: Search through uploaded documents and knowledge base
settings.todosDescription: Create and manage task lists and reminders
settings.snippetsDescription: Save and retrieve code snippets and text
settings.askLlmDescription: Delegate sub-questions to other LLM instances
settings.reasoningDescription: Step-by-step analytical reasoning for complex problems
settings.proxyDescription: Configure HTTP/HTTPS proxy for web requests
settings.locationDescription: Use your location for localized search results and region-specific information
settings.locationHelp: Allows web searches to return locally relevant results

billing.title: Facturering
billing.clearDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear billing data?
billing.signInToViewBilling: Please sign in with Google to view your billing data.
billing.signInStep1: Click the "Sign in with Google" button in the top navigation bar
billing.signInStep2: That's it! Your billing data will load automatically
billing.billingDataNote: üí° Your billing data is stored in a centralized service account Google Sheet and retrieved automatically. No additional permissions or Drive access needed - just sign in with Google.
billing.noBillingData: No billing data available. Please wait...
billing.startUsingChat: Start using the chat to generate billing records. All API usage is automatically tracked.
billing.purchaseCreditsDescription: Purchase credits to use AI features. Minimum purchase: $5.00
billing.tipUseOwnKeys: üí° Tip: Add your own API keys in Settings for $0 LLM costs! Only infrastructure costs apply when using your own keys.
billing.paypalNotLoaded: ‚ö†Ô∏è PayPal SDK not loaded. Please refresh the page.
billing.clearDataWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This action cannot be undone. Your billing data will be permanently deleted.
billing.clearAllDescription: This will delete all transactions from your billing sheet.
billing.considerExportFirst: Consider exporting to CSV first for your records.
billing.clearProviderHint: Useful for aligning with provider billing cycles (e.g., clear monthly).
billing.clearDateRangeHint: Leave blank to clear from beginning/to end. Both can be used together.
billing.confirmUndoCheckbox: I understand this action cannot be undone
